Verifies that CSS.fontsUpdated events are sent after CSS domain is enabled

    fontFamily : Noto Mono
    fontStretch : normal
    fontStyle : normal
    fontVariant : normal
    fontWeight : normal
    platformFontFamily : ಠ_ಠNoto Monoಠ_ಠ
    src : <string>
